data.title: GEORG LUKÁCS IN THE LABYRINTH OF COEXISTENCE
data.text:
Lukács, Georg 1968a, Il marxismo nella coesistenza, Roma: Editori Riuniti

— 1968b, Marxismo e politica culturale, Torino: Giulio Einaudi editore

— 1970, Cultura e potere, Roma: Editori Riuniti

–– 1971 [1923], History and Class Consciousness, Cambridge, Massachusetts: The MIT Press

— 1976, Ontologia dell’essere sociale I, Roma: Editori Riuniti

— 1980 [1954], The Destruction of Reason, London: Merlin Press

— 1983, Record of a Life, London: Verso Editions

— 1991, The Process of Democratization, Albany: State University of New York Press

— 2003, Testamento político y otros escritos sobre política y filosofía, Buenos Aires: Ediciones Herramienta

— 2009, Lenin. A Study on the Unity of His Thought, London, New York: Verso

— 2011, La distruzione della ragione, Milano – Udine: Mimesis Edizioni

— 2013, L’uomo e la rivoluzione, Milano: Edizioni Punto Rosso

— 2014, Tactics and ethics, 1919-1929 The Questions of Parliamentarianism and Other Essays, London, New York: Verso

Adorno, Theodor 1980 [1961], ‘Reconciliation under Duress’ in Aesthetics and Politics, London: Verso

Anderson, Perry 1979 Considerations on Western Marxism, Verso

Deutscher, Isaac 1953, Russia after Stalin, available at: <https://www.marxists.org/archive/deutscher/1953/russiaafterstalin.htm>

— 1965, ‘György Lukács and ‘Critical Realism’, available at <https://www.marxists.org/archive/deutscher/1965/Lukács-critical.htm>

–– 1967, ‘Ideological Trends in the USSR’, available at <https://www.marxists.org/archive/deutscher/1967/ideological_trends_USSR.htm>

Fehér, Ferenc 1979, ‘Lukács in Weimar’, in Telos 39/1979: 113-136

Gabel, Joseph 1966, ‘Korsch, Lukács et le problème de la conscience de classe’, in Annales. Économies, Sociétés, Civilisations. 21e année, N. 3: 668-680

Gargani, Matteo 2016, ‘Un “testamento” senza eredi. Lukács e lo stalinismo’, in Critica Marxista 3: 67–75

Heller, Agnes 1979, ‘The Philosophy of the Late Lukács’, in Philosophy & Social Criticism, Volume 6, Issue 2 1979: 146-163

Jameson, Fredric 1974, Marxism and Form, Princeton University Press

Löwy, Michael 1975, ‘Lukács and Stalinism’, in New Left Review I/91, May–June 1975: 25-41

Marcuse, Herbert 1958, Soviet Marxism, New York: Columbia University Press

Mészáros, István 1995, Beyond Capital. Towards a Theory of Transition, London: The Merlin Press

Preve, Costanzo 2013, Una nuova storia alternativa della filosofia, Pistoia: Editrice Petite Plaisance

Tamás, G.M. 2017, ‘The Never-Ending Lukács Debate’, available at <https://lareviewofbooks.org/article/the-never-ending-Lukács-debate/>

Tertulian, Nicolas 2016, Pourquoi Lukács?, Paris: Éditions de la Maison des sciences de l'homme
